PAD_Unlocked.synopsis: Players unlock the disc/platform in the Shar temple for the first time.
PAD_Unlocked.how_to_trigger: Insert the gem at the socket at SCL_Main_A (-719; 4; -772)

Altar.synopsis: The player approaches an altar dedicated to Shar. This altar is a call to action for the player to complete Shar's trials and become a Dark Justiciar.
Altar.how_to_trigger: Interact with the altar at -717; 3; -773 on SCL_Main_A

PAD_ShadowheartVista.synopsis: Shadowheart sees the giant Shar Statue and lets it set in that she is in the temple of shar.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The available sessions are all set in the temple of Shar. 'PAD_Unlocked' describes the moment when the disc/platform is unlocked in the temple, which is an early event that grants access to the temple's secrets. Once unlocked, the player can interact with the temple environment; for example, 'Altar' is the moment when the player approaches a Shardedicated altar—a call to further engage with the temple’s narrative. Following the altar interaction, 'PAD_ShadowheartVista' takes place, showing Shadowheart’s reaction to the giant Shar statue, a scene that likely happens after the initial unlocking and the altar call-to-action. There are no clear indications that any two of these sessions are mutually exclusive, as they appear to be sequential parts of the same narrative thread in the temple. Hence, the ordering is: PAD_Unlocked → Altar → PAD_ShadowheartVista.

PAD_Unlocked_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Unlocked_0.text: The disc is moving. This must lead to the next part of Shar's Gauntlet.
PAD_Unlocked_0.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if you received knowledge of the Shar trials from the disc altar.NodeContext: [Astarion: 'bloody' as in annoying, not 'lots of blood]

PAD_Unlocked_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Unlocked_1.text: That disc is moving - might be useful to navigate this place.

Altar_30.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_30.text: We have all the gems - let's put them to use and continue onwards.

Altar_4.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_4.text: We should be able to proceed now - the trials are all complete. Lady Shar's final task is near.

Altar_65.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_65.text: There's nothing more for us to do here - not until we complete Lady Shar's trials.

Altar_67.speaker: Narrator
Altar_67.text: *Brave the Gauntlet of your Lady Shar. Surmount her trials, and rise a Dark Justiciar.*
Altar_67.context: NodeContext: The text of a plaque

Altar_27.speaker: Narrator
Altar_27.text: *A shiver of revulsion passes through you. Many enemies of the Moonmaiden must have been indoctrinated in this place.*

Altar_15.speaker: Narrator
Altar_15.text: *Your convictions have proven true. This is the Gauntlet of Lady Shar. Perhaps here, you can show yourself to be worthy. A Dark Justiciar, at last.*

Altar_60.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_60.text: The Gauntlet of Shar.This place is legendary - even with half my memories locked away, I still remember the stories...

Altar_34.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_34.text: The Gauntlet of Shar. This place is legendary - I surrendered most of my memories to help protect Shar's secrets, yet I still remember the stories of the Gauntlet...

Altar_40.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_40.text: The Dark Lady's finest warriors arose from this place - and now I'm here.

Altar_32.speaker: Narrator
Altar_32.text: *There are recesses on the altar that look intended to house something. Another such receptacle already contains a gemstone.*

Altar_22.speaker: Player
Altar_22.text: Hold on - are you telling me you worship Shar, Shadowheart?

Altar_29.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_29.text: Not the place or manner in which I thought you'd learn it, but yes - I worship the Dark Lady.

Altar_14.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_14.text: I'm sorry I kept it from you. It's not a secret to be shared lightly.

Altar_10.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_10.text: The Dark Justiciars were the Nightsinger's most trusted warriors - this is where they earned their place.

Altar_31.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_31.text: In order to join Lady Shar's elite, you had to pass her trials, then make a sacrifice in her innermost sanctum - one revealed only when you've proven yourself. Very few made it that far.

Altar_36.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_36.text: I've dreamed of this place. This is my destiny - I must complete the trials.
Altar_36.context: NodeContext: Determined. The chance of a lifetime has presented itself.

Altar_13.speaker: Player
Altar_13.text: You've been keeping secrets from me - is helping you in my best interest?

Altar_61.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_61.text: We can discuss your hurt feelings later. If we want to make progress in this place, we have to do the trials.

Altar_69.speaker: Player
Altar_69.text: We're here to gain Ketheric Thorm's trust and uncover the Absolute's secrets - nothing more.

Altar_48.speaker: Player
Altar_48.text: This is a distraction. We need to stay focused on finding a cure.

Altar_6.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_6.text: You don't understand - this will help free us from our infection.

Altar_52.speaker: Player
Altar_52.text: Are you sure this is what you want?

Altar_37.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_37.text: You know me better than most - but I need to find out if I'm worthy.

Altar_35.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_35.text: Yes. I've had some doubts in the past... but surely that's normal for such a monumentous step.

Altar_64.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_64.text: Do you really need to ask? It's all I've ever wanted.

Altar_43.speaker: Player
Altar_43.text: What does becoming a Dark Justiciar mean?

Altar_26.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_26.text: What does it mean? It means we'll have power - power we can use to take on the Absolute and rid ourselves of these parasites, once and for all.
Altar_26.context: NodeContext: Slightly surprised that the player doesn't recognise this as a Big Deal.

Altar_20.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_20.text: If I become a Dark Justiciar, I'll have Lady Shar's highest blessing, and her arsenal at my disposal. This will be good for all of us. Let's explore.

Altar_41.speaker: Player
Altar_41.text: I've no intention of letting you prove your fanaticism to Shar.

Altar_57.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_57.text: Don't worry, I won't sacrifice you. I think Lady Shar would want a more impressive offering.

Altar_0.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_0.text: If I prove myself to Lady Shar, she'll bless me with power - power we can use to take on the Absolute and rid ourselves of these parasites, once and for all. Let's explore.

Altar_63.speaker: Player
Altar_63.text: All right, I'll help if I can.

Altar_23.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_23.text: Thank you. If I become a Dark Justiciar, I'll have Lady Shar's highest blessing, and her arsenal at my disposal. This will be good for all of us. Let's explore.

Altar_55.speaker: Shadowheart
Altar_55.text: Frankly I'm amazed you didn't work it out for yourself already. I'm not sure if that makes you highly respectful or deeply ignorant.

Altar_11.speaker: Player
Altar_11.text: Recall the contents of the book you found about Dark Justiciars.

Altar_21.speaker: Player
Altar_21.text: Search your memories. What do you know of the Dark Justiciars?

Altar_3.speaker: Player
Altar_3.text: Search your memories. Do you know anything of the Dark Justiciars?

Altar_58.speaker: Narrator
Altar_58.text: *You recall them being an inner circle of Shar followers - elite warriors, loyal to their last breath.*

Altar_45.speaker: Narrator
Altar_45.text: *The name seems familiar, but nothing comes to you.*

Altar_28.speaker: Player
Altar_28.text: Recall what you read before about the Trials of Shar.

Altar_49.speaker: Player
Altar_49.text: The trials of Lady Shar. Recall what they are - you must know, surely.

Altar_47.speaker: Player
Altar_47.text: The inscription spoke of the trials of Shar. Ask yourself what those could be.

Altar_16.speaker: Narrator
Altar_16.text: *Shar worshippers value traits like stealth, martial prowess, and navigating their goddess' darkness. The trials may test such skills.*

Altar_51.speaker: Narrator
Altar_51.text: *It seems they would complete their initiation with the blood sacrifice of a Selûnite.*

Altar_38.speaker: Narrator
Altar_38.text: *Your suspicions have proven true. This is the Gauntlet of Lady Shar. Perhaps here, you can show yourself to be worthy. A Dark Justiciar, at last.*

Altar_59.speaker: Narrator
Altar_59.text: *Your breath catches. The Gauntlet of Lady Shar - where her Dark Justiciars of old proved their mettle, through gruelling trial and sacrifice. Perhaps you can join their ranks.*

PAD_ShadowheartVista_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartVista_0.text: Lady Shar... so many must have toiled to make a visage so grand. It's beautiful...
PAD_ShadowheartVista_0.context: NodeContext: Overawed at the sight of a statue of liberty-sized representation of Shar, in  the heart of a huge temple.
